questions.question: During Adolescence specific nutrients are required. Identify the most correct nutrients:

choices.answer: Calcium, Vitamin A, Sucrose, Fructose, Iron
Calcium, Sodium, Saturated fats, Phosphorus, Glucose
Calcium, Iron, Carbohydrates, Protein, B-group vitamins
Calcium, Galactose, Sodium, Iron, Trans Fats

questions.question: Food allergies: Select the meal that is safe for someone suffering with a peanut allergy.

choices.answer: Cake made with cake mix
Fried rice from a Chinese Takeaway
Store bought cookies
Freshly cut celery and carrot sticks
A person who does not eat or use animal products.
A person who does not eat animals but eats seafood.
A person who does not eat meat, but eats eggs and dairy.
A person who enjoys the taste of meat but is allergic to it.

questions.question: Judaism requires a diet free from:

choices.answer: Chocolate and dairy products
MSG and other food additives
Beef and cow products
Pork and pig products

questions.question: Athletes may require more of this nutrient to assist in growth and recovery.

choices.answer: Lactose
Protein
Sodium
Phosphorus

questions.question: When bushwalking it is important for food to be:

choices.answer: Able to be heated on a camp stove.
Packed with saturated fat.
Lightweight and nutrient dense.
High in sugar to provide energy.

questions.question: Which meal would be suitable for a coeliac?

choices.answer: Salmon Patties served with rice.
Polenta Pizza Base topped with Cheese, Mushroom and Basil.
Hot dogs with bacon, mustard and cheese.
Steamed Salmon with beans and white sauce.

questions.question: Select a meal appropriate for someone recovering from a broken bone.

choices.answer: Beef & Cheese Ravioli with Kale Salad & Light Cream Sauce
Chicken burger with sweet chilli sauce and iceberg salad.
Pepperoni Pizza with garlic bread.
Honey Chicken with Rice and Prawn Chips.

questions.question: Identify the meal which would be most suitable for a Buddhist:

choices.answer: Sweet Sticky Beef and Rice bowl with Summer Veggies.
Apple and Strawberry Compote with Store Bought Yoghurt.
Fried Rice served with Peach Shredded Duck Rolls.
Bamboo Shoot, Long Green Bean and Mushroom Stir-fry.

questions.question: Select the breakfast that would be most suitable for someone who is lactose intolerant:

choices.answer: Pancakes with maple syrup and banana.
Apricot and Almond Milk Honey Shake.
Ham and Tomato Toastie.
Scrambled eggs with sausage, bacon and roasted tomato.
